input.sentences: there were plenty of fresh baked goods at the store .
i decided to venture out to find a batch of fresh flowers too .
i also wanted to visit a new store for bagels .
my son came along with although he napped for most of the way .

output.sentences: The store had plenty of fresh baked goods.
I ventured on down the street and found a store with fresh flowers.
I also visited a store selling bagels.
My son napped while I shopped.
I relaxed on the pier after a time of shopping.
